column4: And it is because I want to route music on our server, without a sound card, from VLC to teamspeak
Now can someone help me or will people just keep trolling me?
maybe there is some sort of virtual audio hardware for ubuntu that you can use, other way would be to run everything virtualized (like in virtualbox) or the the teamspeak api
I've tried looking for an ubuntu virtualaudio cable but haven't really found much...
